useCase.name: Create Sentient Agent Bundle
useCase.description: A developer creates a new Sentient Agent Bundle (SAB) in the system.

mainSequence.step: The Application Developer initiates creating a Sentient Agent Bundle Request (SABR).
The Sentient Agent Bundle Manager creates a SABR named mySABR1 using template file bundle1.js.
The EventBus is notified to create a new bundle based on the SABR mySABR1.
The Sentient Agent Bundle Manager creates a SABR named mySABR2 using template file bundle2.js.
The EventBus is notified to create a new bundle based on the SABR mySABR2.
The Sentient Agent Bundle Manager creates a SABR named mySABR3 using template file bundle3.js.
The EventBus is notified to create a new bundle based on the SABR mySABR3.
The Sentient Agent Bundle Manager creates a SABR named mySABR4 using template file bundle4.js.
The EventBus is notified to create a new bundle based on the SABR mySABR4.
